sentences.sContent: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.sCn: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.sContent: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.sCn: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

remMethod.val: circ (圆) + ul + ate (做) → 绕圈走 → 循环

words.tran: 循环性的；促进循环的；（货币、报刊等）具有流通性的

trans.tranCn: 流通，  运行，  循环；  传播
trans.tranOther: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
